parameters.content:
📦 MAGENTO 2 STOCK ALERTS
**Author: Kanaka Kishore Kandregula **

WORKFLOW PURPOSE:
Automatically monitor Magento 2 (Adobe Commerce) inventory levels and alert when products are running low

SETUP REQUIREMENTS:
- Magento 2 store with product inventory tracking
- Slack & Gmail channels for alerts (#magento-notifications)
- Define low stock threshold (default: 5 units)

KEY FEATURES

✅ MSI Support
✅ Daily automated inventory checks
✅ Customisable stock thresholds
✅ Multiple SKU Reporting
✅ Proactive restocking alerts

BUSINESS VALUE

🚫 Prevent stockouts
💰 Maintain sales revenue
📊 Better inventory management
⏰ Proactive restocking

TIME TO BUILD: 20 minutes
DIFFICULTY: Intermediate
ROI: High - prevents lost sales

nodes.name: Process Stock Data and Identify Low Stock

parameters.content:
WORK FLOW

1. Schedule Trigger (daily 8:50 AM check)
2. Magento 2 (get all products)
3. Code Node (filter low stock items)
4. If Node (check if any alerts needed)
5. Format alert message
6. Slack & Gmail (send inventory alert)

CONFIGURATION NOTES

- Adjust lowStockThreshold variable in Process Stock Data node
- Modify daily schedule timing as needed
- You Bearer Token from Magento
- Slack & Gmail API details
